polacode.background.markdownDescription: Background color of the snippet's container. Can be any valid value of the CSS property `background`.

polacode.shadow.markdownDescription: Shadow of the snippet node. Can be any valid value of the CSS property `box-shadow`. Ignored if `#polacode.target#` is `snippet`.

polacode.padding.markdownDescription: amount of space reserved around the snippet. Ignored if `#polacode.target#` is `snippet`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Shoot the snippet with padding for `#polacode.shadow#`.
Shoot the snippet on it's own.

polacode.captureScale.markdownDescription: Determines the final size of the capture. A scale of `1` equates to the apparent size of the capture preview.

polacode.windowTitle.description: Display a title at the top of the snippet. Can be overridden by clicking the top of the snippet preview.

polacode.autoSave.description: Automatically save snippet instead of displaying save dialog.

polacode.closeOnSave.description: Close panel after saving a snippet.
